PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1995-13551995-08-160,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PTB
PrecisNORDION AND THERATRONICS EMPLOYEES PENSION PROTECTION REGULATIONS permitting former persons employed at Nordion International Inc. or Theratronics International Limited, who so choose within one year of the transfer of Nordion or Theratronics, in lieu of any other pension option, to have their employment under the new employer's pension plan recognized under the Public Service Superannuation Act for purposes of meeting any length of service requirement for benefit eligibility.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1995-0421 Publication Date: 1995-09-06
